resp = client.search(
    query={
        "term": {
            "user": "kimchy"
        }
    },
    sort={
        "_script": {
            "type": "number",
            "script": {
                "lang": "painless",
                "source": "doc['field_name'].value * params.factor",
                "params": {
                    "factor": 1.1
                }
            },
            "order": "asc"
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
